showerReviews.reviewText: Very terrible I am denied a free shower and parking after spending $942 for diesel for my semi the ta is definitely the anti trucker truck stop . To stay in business in a customer service business taking care of the customer should be first ‚Ä¶

Didn't experience the shower here. Everything else is mostly great. Staff is wonderful. Food court is Burger King and Popeyes. No complaints about the food. Just ask for hot fries at burger King. Make sure your red beans and rice is hot and ‚Ä¶

I took a shower here, 13$, i didnt have to wait, it was pretty clean, no time limit, i brought my own towel and soaps. The mexican lady that cleans them was very kind. The employees at the cashier need to pay more attention to their ‚Ä¶

I almost forgot that I have been here before.. I came here for a shower during the way to San Jose from Los Angeles. The shower room is clean but the towels had a strange smell as last time so that I use my own towels.. and this time, after ‚Ä¶
A gas station with clean restrooms, nice and cozy rest area. Inside there is a small game room and a place to take a shower as well. Burger King is located next door.

‚Ä¶ options! PAID PARKING! I like to use my points / ultra credita towards maintaining my truck OIL CHANGE ETC....not give back for parking!!! Shop at Wal-Mart and before you hit the road only park, fuel, and shower at the greedy locations....

As a driver, great place to stop and get fuel, supplies and even take a shower but I don't understand the reward system or the benefits in it because they never offer me any type of incentives but always ask me if I'm a reward member?
Best shower in the whole world. Especially shower number 5üòÇüòÇüòÇ the most expensive faucet ever created ‚Ä¶
Very nice people and very clean restrooms and shower.
Shower wait it too long..and its not the customer is the staff that take too long to wipe down the shower..2hours wait..truckers want to go in and out...

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The shower wasn't bad, having hot water and decent water pressure. A driver's lounge with big comfortable seats. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ or you possibly forgot to pay that utility bill you can go to that nearby T/A truck stop. For a nominal fee of $18 bucks you can get a shower. Yeh sure you can go to the side of the road rest area and rinse off from that small dinky ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and it's also got a little arcade room, where you can play video games, watch t.v., and play pool! There's also shower rooms that you can rent to shower, and a service station as well for the truckers when they stop to fuel up and rest.

Most of parking lot is paid reserved parking $20. I asked redeem a shower and he took the points for the shower. Scam.
Everybody banded together and don't fratinise TA or Petro. They are as the democratic party...dishonest and shifty.
They have Popeye chicken, burger king and something else. They also have jack in box and McDonald's across street. Great place to put gas when traveling and need snacks or shower. The gas is shell.
Plenty of parking, customer service was a little, uh. Maybe the weather was a factor, shower was good, Plenty of hot water.

Great place for  anything truckers may need and autos to gasoline along with hotel's and Denny's restaurant truckwash with barbershop next door to truck wash very clean inside TA with shower's also great place for 34 hour reset.......
Another good truck stop. Parking, diesel, country pride restaurant's excellent food, and shower's. You can't go wrong here.
Another overpriced truckstop usually have a good shower restaurant not very good overpriced
Friendly staff, and no wait for a shower!

showerReviews.reviewText: They have the nastiest showers i have shower power and I had to pay for my show no towels They say they sell #2 diesel and is not is actually biodiesel this is a ripoff in the pump some say #2 diesel others say biodiesel I ask cashier about ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Stumbled upon it late and had many spots open. You can use Pilot card here. The shower comes with a free golf cart ride across the parking lot to another building. Hold on tight my man takes off quick. No towels, but I use my own anyway. A ‚Ä¶

Women's rest room is "out of order" despite the cashier coming out of it as I came in. Showers all have signs saying use shower only, so apparently you can't use a toilet even if you pay for a shower. According to reviews from a year ago, ‚Ä¶
Diesel prices are usually the best, however the driveway needs some work, inside is only minimally cleaned, shower and restrooms could use some TLC
Nasty nothing in the shower is omg disgusting and staff locks doors and its a 24 7 place wth

showerReviews.reviewText: Best truck stop I‚Äôve ever been too, out does all the name brand truck stops, not only do they have amazing showers hot water! Clean bathrooms! Easy access to laundry only takes coins, but they have good food inside, they sell beer, easy in ‚Ä¶
Very clean showers with towel and washcloth provided. Was able to shower and wash our car sick toddler, fuel up, snack up, and return to the road with all smiles. Thank you!!!

I showered here a dozen times and tipped the cleaning people everytime until one day I was denied after driving all the way over here. Apparently the showers are only for "commercial" drivers. Yet every employee has sold me a shower except ‚Ä¶

I like the place. Lots of parking. Be prepared though if you want a shower they hold your license until you bring the key back. It just weirded me out someone having my cdl. Shower was modern and very clean. Good water pressure.
Shower was actually really clean üëç was happy about that. Also it‚Äôs $17.00 for a shower. ‚Ä¶

My favorite place to stop along the 5!   Has everything you need, showers are clean ( cashiers hold your license and return it to u when u give them the shower key back).  Dickeys BBQ, Carls Jr in walking distance.   The pre-made sandwiches ‚Ä¶

This place is really bad. I went and took a shower in shower 8 and it's really bad everything is!! dirty !! And the lady that cleans the showers is not a good person I talked to her about the shower and she said yes!! what ever !! I don't ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a pretty decent truck stop has lots of parking, laundry, trucker lounge and showers there‚Äôs a truck was next door Dennys and a Dickeys BBQ. Great place to stop and do your 30 min break or 10 hr rest I‚Äôm giving it a 2 star only because ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ out on the road. Not only Gas station but the Store has Awesome variety and selections.....everything you are needing will almost always be here. Also have shower rooms if you need that too. Plus have a Dennys connected right next door.
Clean very helpful staff, good place to park a lot larger parking area then I thought for semi‚Äôs. Next time I plan on using the shower. I‚Äôll give another update on that one as well.

showerReviews.reviewText: Got a shower there this morning around 7am....nobody there taking showers..I'm the only one. Just prior I had mouthed something to the Asian woman who stared me down as I walked in with my backpack. As I am in the bathroom, employees start ‚Ä¶

As a truck driver, I generally rate the truck stops by their showers. That‚Äôs what I appreciate most about them. This time I get five stars the shower was clean extremely clean, now there wasn‚Äôt a trashcan to throw my Q-tips in, so I‚Äôll do ‚Ä¶

Me and my daughter have recently become homeless and after the 100 degree heat today we NEEDED a shower!!! lol so not ever taking a shower at a gas station before the worker at the front was very nice and showed me what was what and I had ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Long wait times and lazy shower staff ‚Ä¶

Shower was good, laundry was good but the food gets zero stars!!!!! I broke the wings open and didn‚Äôt even get a bite after what I saw. They looked good on the outside but the inside was disgusting! I‚Äôll leave photos and a video below to ‚Ä¶
First time in pilot, dirty shower. there was hair and pee where u sit on toilet also there was hair in sink. everywhere is dirty im not sure someone cleaned here

‚Ä¶ if I don't  never come  that pilot . That lady made me feel guilty without saying anything. The main reason is because my colour is black ..thank your your given me such respect ‚Ä¶ And to make me feel guilty. They took my shower also .
Shower was great  good presure clean stalls customer service at counter was smiling faces good place to be ..thank you from a driver .

I took a shower here in Lathrop, California off Roth Road exit 465  I got Shower  number four. The shower was so clean  I was so impressed whoever cleaned it needs a raise. Too bad I can‚Äôt leave good reviews at a lot of the other truck ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Stopped here for shower & laundry. ‚Ä¶
